Articles.Content: Hello. Recently installed the 1.05 update. A bit miffed at having to re-purchase many parts in career mode when playing on moderate difficulty. More miffed about the Whiplash Turbojet engine, which I have bought and researched, not showing up with the rest of the engines. As in, I see it in the science trees, but not in the build options in the hangers. I had just got it prior to 1.05 and was really looking forward to upgrading my jets. Is the engine gone?
I'm having the same issue with the Whiplash Turbojet not showing up in the hangar even though it shows up as purchased in the tech tree. Is there a fix?
Many aero parts were moved so you will need to re-research them.
